V-SYS is thrilled with the opportunities that the BTC explosion uncovers for numerous hosting companies. We welcome Bit coin payments for web-site host solutions, it is a harmless and swift . As privacy-focused servers host, we do not need any piece of information about our clients, indeed, BTC payments allow our customers to use our server hosting services 100% safely & anonymously. Enjoy confidentiality defense & low fees as Bit coin are mainstream today. BTC & any other crypto currencies payments are one of the main perks of anonymous hosting from Virtual Systems!

Virtual hosting is your best choice if you are in need of more advanced hosting solutions, but can't afford a server, or don't want to deal with the complexity of bare metal beasts. Ordering a VPS is when you get your personal virtual server environment: full control over operating system, software extensions and all the settings. Each VPS instance is allocated with key resources as CPU cores, amount of RAM & storage. Numerous professional and business owners often go with VPS over shared hosting.


Why choose BITCOIN HOSTING from VSYS.host?

✔ Accepting Bitcoin Payments Automatically

✔ 24/7 Customer Support By Seasoned Professionals
✔ Powered by cPanel - Hosting Platform of Choice

Bonuses:

FULLY PROTECTED ANONYMOUS SERVICE​

Illegitimate legal abuse, volumetric DDoS attack or hardware/software failure - we got you covered! Your data is protected at privately owned hardware in certified secure datacenters in offshore locations. Your privacy is respected - no personal information required & Bicoin payments accepted.

REASONABLE & AFFORDABLE PRICES​

Own server hardware & network equipment - no reseller markup. Affodable bandwidth due to optimal balance: inbound traffic made by local clients VS outbound by off-shore clients. Keep golden spot between affordability & service quality. The most reasonably priced hosting services in the niche!

QUALITY COMMITTED SUPPORT​

In-house tech support team is operating 24/7, only these highly qualified staff have an access to hardware & network. Friendly & savvy staff will assist you with any issues related to web hosting - just 15 minutes to respond to your ticket. Sales support via live chat is ready to answer your questions now.

HIGH PERFORMANCE NETWORK​

1 Tbps of IP traffic. Multiple datacenters. Different uplinks & peerings. Automatic route optimization software. Excellent coonectivity to East Cost of US & whole EMEA region. Built to get lowest latency and zero-loss network routes. Large IPTV streaming projects & adult tube sites are wellcome!
